sentence.Network_en: Phylogenetic relationships among 18 accessions belonging to Fortunella and Citrus were investigated by using SSR markers.
sentence.Network_cn: 用SSR标记分析了金柑属(Fortunella)及柑橘属(Citrus)植物的亲缘关系.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Determination of the Nutrition Composition of the Fortunella spp遂川金柑营养成分的分析研究
Cluster analysis via NTSYS-PC software showed that Citrus was close to Fortunella.用NTSYS-PC软件进行分析,结果表明,金柑属植物与宽皮柑橘的亲缘关系很近;。
fortune 际遇, fortunella 金桔属, fortunei 无刺枸骨

means.word_mean: 1. small genus of shrubs native to south China producing small ovoid fruits resembling oranges: includes kumquats
